author: marekm3498
content: but we tested an archive sync with era files on mainnet, right?

author: somnergy
content:
The [execution-apis spec](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/blob/main/src/engine/prague.md#engine_newpayloadv4) doesn't mention throwing error when CL sends `nil` instead of empty `[]` list for `executionRequests` in `engine_newPayloadV4`. Also consider that the specs do mention sending `[]` form `expectedBlobVersionedHashes`
Are other EL clients letting `nil` be accepted or throwing?
